attributes.title: We Ambushed Rooster Teeth…
attributes.description: Best Friends Today ambushes RT to tell you about everything we have going on that you don’t want to miss!

attributes.title: We Need To Make A Change…
attributes.description:
We also have an announcement for Achievement Hunter: 
https://roosterteeth.com/watch/achievement-hunter-2023-achievement-hunter-announcement
Check out our new exciting project, Dogbark!: 
https://roosterteeth.com/watch/achievement-hunter-2023-now-announcing-dogbark

Rooster Teeth depends on supporters like you to let us make the content we love to make! Learn more about FIRST, Rooster Teeth’s own patronage platform at https://info.roosterteeth.com/  to support our creators.

Rooster Teeth is making some big changes to your FIRST membership! We are always listening to feedback from our community and audience and have some changes in store for you. Free content will always be free, and content on FIRST will always just on FIRST - keeping it simple. We want to put our supporters  FIRST, not just show them content FIRST.

We are also always improving roosterteeth.com and making sure the content on our platform is easy (and fun) to watch! When you watch an advertisement on the site - we get 10x the support when you watch an ad on our site and not on YouTube (sorry YouTube metadata) 

As always, FIRST supporters will get a fully ad-free viewing experience, discounts on exclusive merch, badges and cool stuff on our official Discord, and of course, the satisfaction of knowing that YOU, yes, YOU, are what make all the hilarious, fun, crazy, chaotic, endearing, wild, unique content possible for all of us. Thank you so much for years of support, and we promise to deliver more!

We are going to add a few things to FIRST as well: meet and greets from cast and talent in the Discord, monthly live streams from each content group, and the ability to vote on what content you wanna see us create! We want you guys to join in on all our fun and come with us for the ride.

attributes.title: Laughing at Rooster Teeth in 2023
attributes.description: Best Friends Today visit an amateur comedy club and learn all about what RT did in 2023 and some things coming in 2024.
